Name: Miami Beach
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of pineapple wedge & Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: Fruity and frothy topped. Like Baywatch!
Nutrition: One serving of Miami Beach contains 181 calories
